name: My Sweet Washing Machine!
description:
General


My Sweet Washing Machine! is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Washing Machines

Incredible Atmosphere, Great Music, lots of levels with washing machines art in HD quality.
The game is great for relaxing after a hard day.

Features

  • Several difficulty levels.
  • Relaxing gameplay
  • 7 HD quality art with beautiful girls
  • Pleasant atmosphere.

Game Modes:


  • EASY - 4x4
  • MEDIUM - 4x6
  • ADVANCED - 6x10
  • HARD - 8x14
  • EPIC- 10x16
